sentences.sContent: So birds are monogamous but they cheat as well, within limits.
sentences.sContent_eng: So birds are monogamous but they cheat as well, within limits.
sentences.sCn: 所以鸟类是一夫一妻制，但它们也背叛，有限度地。

sentences.sContent: Unlike most other fish, they are monogamous and mate for life.
sentences.sContent_eng: Unlike most other fish, they are monogamous and mate for life.
sentences.sCn: 不像其他的鱼类，它们是一夫一妻制并终生厮守。

sentences.sContent: Many birds are socially monogamous, which is to say that the male and female form an exclusive bond and spend a great deal of their time together.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many birds are socially monogamous, which is to say that the male and female form an exclusive bond and spend a great deal of their time together.
sentences.sCn: 许多种鸟类都实行社会化的一夫一妻制：雄性与雌性组成独占性的结合，一起度过生命中的大部分时间。

remMethod.val: mono(单个) + gam(婚姻) + ous → 单一婚姻的 → 一夫一妻制的

words.tran: 一夫一妻制；[动] 单配偶，[动] 单配性

trans.tranCn: 一夫一妻的, 单配的
